title: Anti-government protests in China
material_description: Digital screen recording of @TomMackenzieTV's twitter post
brief_description: Street protests have broken out in major Chinese cities. Originally sparked by strick Covid lockdowns, protestors have been calling for greater freedom from state control on a number of issues. Police have been observed deleting photos and video of the events from participants’ phones in a vain attempt to limit the spread of information.
